ValidationRule.description: Backlog Reason & Date added to Backlog should be required when the status is set to Backlog
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Enhancements", ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Backlog'), OR( ISBLANK(Backlog_Reason__c), ISBLANK(Date_Added_to_Backlog__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a 'Backlog Reason' and a 'Date Added to Backlog'.
